title: Webcam Eye-tracking R Package
text:
WebgazeR
Functions for analyzing webcam eye-tracking data

title: Citation
text:
Citation
To cite package ‘webgazeR’ in publications use:

  Geller J, Prystauka Y (2025). _webgazeR: Tools for Processing Webcam Eye Tracking Data_. R
  package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/jgeller112/webgazeR,
  <https://jgeller112.github.io/webgazeR/>.

A BibTeX entry for LaTeX users is

  @Manual{,
    title = {webgazeR: Tools for Processing Webcam Eye Tracking Data},
    author = {Jason Geller and Yanina Prystauka},
    year = {2025},
    note = {R package version 0.1.0, 
https://github.com/jgeller112/webgazeR},
    url = {https://jgeller112.github.io/webgazeR/},
  }
